check_value.comment: withdraw if less than withdraw threshold

do_if.comment: assumes this is already in an attack run_script set in order.fight.attack.object

do_else.comment: assumes in any other order with this handler

check_any.comment: new target needs to be bigger or old target is a station

check_value.comment: new target is bigger than current target
new LXL target is more dangerous than current station target

check_any.comment: current order is not attack or is of different target
next order is not attack or is of different target

check_value.comment: too many attack orders if there's already a 3rd attack order

do_if.comment: release all from tactical order and just attack

do_elseif.comment: release self from tactical order and attack new

event_gravidar_has_scanned.object: if (@$kAAITParam_isAvoidHighRisk and (not @$kAAITParam_iskAAITOrder) and (not @this.$kAAIT_data.$isIgnoreKAAIT)) then this.assignedcontrolled else null

set_value.name: this.$kAAIT_data.$combatRange_min

actions.name: kAAIT_GetIsTargetHighRisk
actions.comment: also update 'is event.param high-risk' conditions in different handlers

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.size gt this.assignedcontrolled.size * 1.5 and ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station or ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.primarypurpose == purpose.fight and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.type != shiptype.carrier ) )

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isTargetHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk and ( ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_xs, class.ship_s] and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.ship and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * this.$kAAIT_data.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Config.$xss_outnumberVShips / 100.0 ) or ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.[class.ship_xs, class.ship_s] and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * this.$kAAIT_data.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Config.$xss_outnumberVStations / 100.0 ) or ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.ship_m and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.ship and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * this.$kAAIT_data.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Config.$m_outnumberVShips / 100.0 ) or ( this.assignedcontrolled.isclass.ship_m and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station and @$kAAIT_target_highRiskEntity.$kAAIT_attackers.count * this.$kAAIT_data.$skill_attackers_count_mult le $kAAIT_gunCount * global.$kAAIT_Config.$m_outnumberVStations / 100.0 ) or $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.hullpercentage lt 1 ) and ( (not this.assignedcontrolled.dps.missiles.all) or (not this.assignedcontrolled.ammostorage.missile.count) )

set_value.name: $kAAIT_isTargetPotentialHighRisk
set_value.exact: $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.station or ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.size gt this.assignedcontrolled.size * 1.5 and $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.primarypurpose == purpose.fight and @$kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.type != shiptype.carrier ) or ( $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.isclass.[class.ship_l, class.ship_xl] and $kAAIT_test_target_isHighRisk.dps.all gt this.assignedcontrolled.dps.all * 1.25 )

do_if.value: this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget != @this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget_stoppedKamikaze and ( ( this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget.isclass.station and $kAAIT_distToTarget gt this.assignedcontrolled.maxradarrange * 0.5 ) or ( this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget.isclass.ship and (not @this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget.isclass.ship.travel.active) and $kAAIT_distToTarget gt this.assignedcontrolled.maxradarrange ) )

do_if.comment: because this is circling a big target already, any object farther away would put the big target in the way

actions.name: kAAIT_GetSkillVars
actions.comment: also update 'is event.param high-risk' conditions in different handlers

do_if.comment: put attack order 2nd on the list
if TacticalOrder, cancel it. then re-add it.
movement in attack order or from an attack event

set_value.name: $kAAIT_test_space_isAvoid
set_value.comment: in case no avoidance is necessary, setting this checks if avoidance required on the way to this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget

debug_text.text: this.assignedcontrolled.idcode + ' CHECK AHEAD FOR BIG ENEMIES'

do_if.value: this.assignedcontrolled.primarypurpose == purpose.fight and this.assignedcontrolled.type != shiptype.carrier and ( $kAAIT_bigEnemy == @this.$kAAIT_data.$defensibleTarget or $kAAIT_bigEnemy == @this.assignedcontrolled.order.$primarytarget or $kAAIT_bigEnemy == @this.assignedcontrolled.commander.order.$primarytarget or $kAAIT_bigEnemy == @this.assignedcontrolled.commander.order.$primarytarget.defensible )
do_if.comment: fighters engage their target even if the target is high-risk or a potential high-risk

do_if.value: $kAAIT_distToBigEnemy le this.assignedcontrolled.maxradarrange * 0.25 or ( $kAAIT_distToBigEnemy le $kAAIT_distToDest and $kAAIT_yawDiff lt 45 )
